channel.title: CVE Feed for AlgolPlus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AlgolPlus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-38095|2024-09-17T02:57:53.721Z -- algolplus -- advanced%20dynamic%20pricing%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in AlgolPlus Advanced Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce plugin <= 4.1.3 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-43491|2024-09-17T00:26:57.108Z -- algolplus -- advanced%20dynamic%20pricing%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Advanced Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce plugin <= 4.1.5 on WordPress leading to plugin settings import.

item.title: CVE-2022-41655|2024-09-17T00:50:56.422Z -- algolplus -- phone%20orders%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Sensitive Data Exposure vulnerability in Phone Orders for WooCommerce plugin <= 3.7.1 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-31266|2024-07-17T20:39:22.951Z -- algolplus -- advanced%20order%20export%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in AlgolPlus Advanced Order Export For WooCommerce allows Code Injection.This issue affects Advanced Order Export For WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.4.4.

item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in AlgolPlus Advanced Order Export For WooCommerce allows Code Injection.This issue affects Advanced Order Export For WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.4.4.
